list.catch: Catch a ball thrown at you. NOT IMPLEMENTED
list.command: Make/update a new command - Whitelist Only
list.command+: Make/update a new mod-only command - Whitelist Only
list.command-: Remove a custom command - Whitelist Only
list.commands: List all of commands - Whitelist Only
list.dimes: Display number of dimes a user has
list.ping: Play ping pong with the bot!
list.raided: Thank another streamer for a raid
list.throw: Throw a ball at another player. NOT IMPLEMENTED
list.uptime: Display how long the bot's been activated

usage.dimes: !dimes for your # of Gears, !dimes <user> for specific user's gears
usage.quote: !quote (for random), !quote <user> for specific user's quote, !quote add <user> "<quote>" <game>
